dct_title_s: Map of British Guiana : from the latest surveys of Schomburgk, Owen, Hilhouse, & others ; & those of Hancock, Van-Cooten, Bouchenroeder, & Bercheyck ...
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; Hand col. shows cultivated and previously cultivated lands; shows also pariochial divisions, etc.; "Respectfully dedicated to His Excellency Henry Light Esqr., Governor ... by His Excellency's very obedient, humble servant J. Hadfield, Crown Surveyor ..."
